Mr. BILIRAKIS. Mr. Speaker, I move to suspend the rules and pass the  bill (H.R. 2481) to require online dating service providers to provide  fraud ban notifications to online dating servicemembers, and for other  purposes.

The Clerk read the title of the bill.

…my bill, the  Romance Scam Prevention Act. Every year, millions of Americans from all  ages and backgrounds use dating apps and websites to make connections.

For many, online dating has made it easier to build relationships.  Unfortunately, there are countless stories of criminals using these  sites for fraudulent activity.
